bio:
Morven is a Breton member of the Forsworn and citizen of Markarth.
Morven is usually found in Nepos's House. He does little except take care of Nepos. Morven offers no interaction with the Dragonborn; only dialogue.
Morven is involved in this quest as a Forsworn agent working with Nepos the Nose. Once the Dragonborn has completed their dialogue with Nepos the Nose, Tynan, Nepos, Morven and Uaile will attack.
name: Morven
